basics.name: Christopher C Skinner
basics.label: Geospatial Data Management • Data Science • Data Architect
basics.summary: Senior Geospatial Administrator with 20+ years leading enterprise GIS and Data platforms in energy and environmental domains. Expert in ArcGIS Enterprise, SQL Server, and Python with a focus on automation, integration, and metadata strategy. Proven track record modernizing legacy systems and aligning spatial data workflows with business goals.

work.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Energy Resources Program
work.position: Data Management and Data Science Lead
highlights: Modernized enterprise spatial systems to support secure, scalable GIS services.
Directed team efforts in ArcGIS Enterprise architecture and administration.
Built spatial data models and automated pipelines for multi-theme datasets.
Led GIS metadata standards adoption across geoscience teams.
Partnered with IT to optimize infrastructure and system performance.

work.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Energy Resources Program
highlights: Managed $2.7M/year upstream data contract across oil & gas, geothermal, and CCUS.
Integrated proprietary/vendor datasets into Kingdom and ArcGIS via SQL and Python.
Produced dashboards and spatial apps for compliance and reporting.
Maintained quality control protocols and coordinated access control policies.

work.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Energy Resources Program
highlights: Designed spatial databases and automated geoprocessing with Python and SQL.
Supported ArcGIS Server and enterprise geodatabase administration.
Integrated legacy and cloud systems for public-facing data applications.
Promoted data stewardship and accessibility through outreach and training.

education.notes: Department of Forest Sciences Honor Senior

awards.title: Esri Special Achievement in GIS Award
awards.summary: Presented by President Jack Dangermond for innovation and impact in enterprise geospatial systems.
